com.agorapulse.testing.fixt

Class Fixt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agorapulse.testing.fixt.Fixt

  • public class Fixt
extends Object
    Simple tool for managing test fixtures in folders which corresponds the package and the name of the specification class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Returns the stream for given relative path.

      • getTestResourcesLocation

        public static String getTestResourcesLocation()
        Find the location of the test resources folder.
        Returns:
        the location of the test resources folder

      • mkdirs

        public boolean mkdirs()
        Creates the directory for the fixtures. The root for the fixtures is either specified with `TEST_RESOURCES_FOLDER` system property or defaults to src/test/resources.

      • writeStream

        public File writeStream(String fileName,
                        InputStream stream)
                 throws IOException
        Saves the fixture to the appropriate location. The root for the fixtures is either specified with `TEST_RESOURCES_FOLDER` system property or defaults to src/test/resources.
        Parameters:
        fileName - relative name of the file
        stream - the stream with the content for the new file
        Returns:
        the newly created file
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readStream

        public InputStream readStream(String fileName)
        Returns the stream for given relative path. The file must be located in the directory package/as/path/NameOfTheSpec.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the relative file name
        Returns:
        the stream representing the content of the given file

      • readText

        public String readText(String fileName)
        Returns the stream for given relative path. The file must be located in the directory package/as/path/NameOfTheSpec.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the relative file name
        Returns:
        the text stored in the given file

      • writeText

        public File writeText(String fileName,
                      String text)
               throws IOException
        Saves the fixture to the appropriate location. The root for the fixtures is either specified with `TEST_RESOURCES_FOLDER` system property or defaults to src/test/resources.
        Parameters:
        fileName - relative name of the file
        text - the text of the new file
        Returns:
        the newly created file
        Throws:
        IOException
